revised_title: Innovative Beehive Design for Swarm Prevention and Honey Harvesting
tldr: The author describes a bee-friendly beehive design that prevents swarming and allows for easy honey harvesting. The beehive consists of two stacked compartments, with a sliding shutter to cover the entrance and windows for ventilation. A knife can be inserted through a hole to cut the honeycombs without harming the bees. This design enables efficient honey collection and helps maintain a healthy bee population.
